document.full_text: u.s. stocks finished mostly flat in a choppy session on wednesday, as investors bet on strong technology earnings even as jpmorgan chase's numbers weighed on other market sectors.
document.title: wall street encouraged by tech, less so by jpmorgan
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks finished mostly flat in a choppy session on wednesday, as investors bet on strong technology earnings even as jpmorgan chase's numbers weighed on other market sectors.
